Plot: A teenage boy musters up the courage to send that make-or-break text to the hottest girl in school...then he waits for her to answer...and then he waits some more.
Title: Mixed Messages
Writer: Steven Della Salla, Michael Leavy, Robert Privitera
Actors: Robert Privitera, Lenore Genovese, Michael Leavy, Gilbrando Acevedo
